TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content: It's that accusing look.. as though it's MY fault he can't land properly [![3yps16Lh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3yps16Lh.jpg)](http://imgur.com/3yps16L)

This rookie doesn't look too happy about his own perceived safety. (Don't worry, rookie, this spaceplane works just fine.)

![screenshot661.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-OxMm3N9bT4w/VXHDRIo6z7I/AAAAAAAABbc/Wnux81bCt0c/s800/screenshot661.png)

I still don't know how this craft survived 1.0

![iOsIeUg.png](https://i.imgur.com/iOsIeUg.png)

I love this one

![VenusChuteManouver.gif](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22015656/VenusChuteManouver.gif)

> 
> I still don't know how this craft survived 1.0
> [https://i.imgur.com/iOsIeUg.png](https://i.imgur.com/iOsIeUg.png)

You haven't seen mine xD

^^ Surely flying with scissors is even more dangerous than running with them. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I think I may have not brought enough fuel. Or remembered how to land properly...

![3035190CE90D843557EC12B3985EDE47BCC62657](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/55499569457210872/3035190CE90D843557EC12B3985EDE47BCC62657/)

I find it particularly amusing he's hanging on to an upside down ladder. 

"Thanks Percy. Good job. Really."

never scissor with the runs

![comicboardlesson1.png](http://files.explosm.net/comics/Dave/comicboardlesson1.png)

Tried to dock a heatshield to a Jool Grand Tour vessel... BOOOM... the trusses whipping around... like impersonating the kraken. Makes me laugh all the time....

![c58sk7H.png](http://i.imgur.com/c58sk7H.png)

Think I've posted it a couple times, but I chuckle at the memory. 

![I6Gn9Cv.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/I6Gn9Cv.jpg)

This is glorious!

Nothing special.. but this...

it tore the heart out of any sense of place I had at the time. shattering the realism barrier.. causing me to laugh and feel digusted all at the same time..

she was promptly ejected from the locomotive as a sacrifice to the kraken ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
